meanings.definition: Not relating to or taking place in a classroom.

meanings.sent4: His nonclassroom approach to problem-solving was like a breath of fresh air.
meanings.sent5: The nonclassroom environment of the park sparked creativity in the students.

meanings.definition: Outside of a traditional classroom setting.
